sqlMap.select: SELECT tag_id, tag_name, tag_ctr FROM tags WHERE tag_id = #id#
SELECT tag_id, tag_name, tag_ctr FROM tags WHERE tag_name = #name#
SELECT tag_id, tag_name, tag_ctr FROM tags WHERE tag_ctr = #count# LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#
SELECT tag_id, tag_name, tag_ctr FROM tags t LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#
SELECT tag_id, tag_name, tag_ctr FROM tags WHERE tag_name REGEXP '^regex' LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#
SELECT tag_name, count(tag_name) AS tag_ctr FROM tas t WHERE t.group = #groupType# GROUP BY t.tag_name LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#
SELECT tag_name, count(tag_name) AS tag_ctr FROM tas t WHERE t.user_name = #requestedUserName# GROUP BY t.tag_name LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#

SELECT tag_name, count(tag_name) AS tag_ctr FROM ((SELECT tag_name FROM tas t, groups g WHERE g.group = #groupId# AND g.user_name=t.user_name ) UNION (SELECT tag_name FROM tas t, groups g, friends f WHERE f.f_user_name = #userName# AND g.user_name = f.user_name AND t.user_name = f.user_name AND g.group = #groupId# AND t.group = $groupType$) UNION (SELECT tag_name FROM tas t, groups g WHERE t.user_name = #userName# AND g.user_name = t.user_name AND g.group = #groupId#)) AS tagsalias GROUP BY tag_name LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO tags (tag_name, tag_ctr) VALUES (#name#,1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE tag_ctr = tag_ctr+1
INSERT INTO tagtag_batch (content_id, tags, toinc) VALUES (#contentId#, #tagList#, #jobInteger#)
